ygData.subject: Re: crookstinger.  Magic weapon ****SPOILER****
ygData.msgSnippet: Crookstinger always seemed to be around the Orc Camp by the end of a path. He just sort of wanders through and seems to be a rare spawn as is Old Dimmshimmer
ygData.messageBody:
Crookstinger always seemed to be around the Orc Camp by the end of a path.
He just sort of wanders through and seems to be a rare spawn as is Old
Dimmshimmer and the queen spider (she is named also).

I killed crookstinger by the Orc Camp (end of path). Wish I had a better
description of the orc camp im talking about but there are only 2 orc camps
ther that I know of. One orc camp is by the Wood Elf camp(thats NOT the
right area).

- Ziff

-----Original Message-----
From: McCartney, Michael R [mailto:Michael.McCartney2@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 4:04 PM
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: crookstinger. Magic weapon?


From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>

Does "Crookstinger" just wander all over lesser fay? Or is there a specific
place I should be hunting for him?

Thanks,

Drev

> ----------
> From: Spehar, David J[SMTP:David.Spehar@...]
> Reply To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, April 28, 1999 1:05 PM
> To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: crookstinger. Magic weapon?
>
> From: "Spehar, David J" <David.Spehar@...>
>
> yes it can hit creatures that require magic to hit melee. And look for
> "CrookStinger" the big ass wasp in lesser faydark. There is also the huge
> Fae Drake Old Dimmshimmer and some sort of queen Giant spider (named
> spider...not sure what she loots).
>
> -Ziffnab
>
